relation: Great for these types of students
fresh graduated high students, adults low on money, adults looking to earn a degree and a new beginning
one of the cheapest schools around
multiple different clubs and societies for each individual person along with intramural sports teams throughout the year
own cafeteria on campus along with other various vending machines for snacking.
no dorms are actually on campus, although we do have Men's and Women's basketball teams and a up and coming baseball team
just your basic college classes and professors
GHC is cheap university for graduating high students, who are 1) low on tuition funds and 2) undecided on what exact major they want to have just quite yet

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety Some incidents, but overall it is very safe. Clubs and Activities More like clubs rather than activities or sports. Great for these types of students Focused. Want to get done with school fast. Looking for great campus that is very diverse. Bang for the buck Classes are fairly priced and much cheaper than most colleges. What to do for fun Very Diverse Campus & Tons Of Different People .... The School Does Offer Clubs. Food and Dining Unless your at the Marietta campus, you do not have a cafeteria on campus, your best bet would be local restaurants. Dorm Life Only if your on the Marietta campus ! Academic Rigor Awesome ! Tips for prospective students Choose your teachers wisely and don't try and overdue it by taking too many classes. In three
